name: Empowered Logging
description: Greatly enhances the Energetic Harvesting power with additional Logging effects. 1 Harvest Pip: When Energetic Harvest is activated also gain Empowered Logging, which increases Logging by 5%. 2 Harvest Pips: When Perceptive Harvest is activated also gain Perceptive Logging, which increases Spot Weakness: Wood by 5%. 3 Harvest Pips: Increases the Stamina restore amount by 4. 4 Harvest Pips: When Heightened Harvest is activated also gain Heightened Logging, which increases the effectiveness of any Energetic Harvest. Perceptive Harvest, and Stamina restore effects gained in the next 7 seconds. 5 Harvest Pips: When Furious Reaping is activated also adds Furious Logging, which increases Harvest Base Damage: Wood by 30. Lasts 6 seconds or 2 hits, whichever comes first.
